addPayee(address,uint256).details: Add a new payee to the contract.

params._shares: The number of shares owned by the payee.
params.account: The address of the payee to add.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payee(uint256).details: Getter for the address of the payee number `index`.

record(address).details: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

release(address).details: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of tokens they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals.

released(address).details: Getter for the amount of Tokens already released to a payee.

removePayee(address).details: Remove a payee from the contract.

params.account: The address of the payee to remove.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

shares(address).details: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

totalReleased().details: Getter for the total amount of Tokens already released.

totalShares().details: Getter for the total shares held by payees.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.sharesAmount: The number of shares to be transfered by the transferrer.
params.to: The address of the shares destinatary to transfer to.

updatePayee(address,uint256).details: Add a new payee to the contract.

params._shares: The number of shares owned by the payee.
params.account: The address of the payee to add.
